entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: W 23 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light late this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
